name: Side Sliders
description:
Move with the arrow keys

Fall through the hole on each line

Game over if you reach the top of the screen!

You can teleport to the other side of the screen by entering one side of the screen, but the middle will reverse the direction of your controls!

This game was made in exactly 2:58:33 as per the 3 hour requirement for Trijam154 where the theme was "There is a twist"
